document.full_text: japan's nuclear crisis appeared to be spinning out of control on wednesday after workers withdrew briefly from a stricken power plant because of surging radiation levels and a helicopter failed to drop water on the most troubled reactor.
document.title: japan scrambles to save nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: japan's nuclear crisis appeared to be spinning out of control on wednesday after workers withdrew briefly from a stricken power plant because of surging radiation levels and a helicopter failed to drop water on the most troubled reactor.
